task: Design a marketing strategy for launching a new product

inputs.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: EcoBottle - A smart water bottle that tracks hydration, reminds users to drink water via smartphone app notifications, syncs with fitness apps, and is made from 100% recycled materials. Features LED indicators and 24-hour battery life. Retail price: $45.
inputs.TARGET_AUDIENCE: Health-conscious millennials and Gen Z (ages 22-35), urban professionals interested in fitness, wellness, and sustainability. Tech-savvy early adopters.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should create comprehensive strategy with digital focus, influencer marketing, and sustainability messaging
validation_criteria: Each channel has rationale, tactics, budget allocation, and expected outcomes
Channels appropriate for target audience (e.g., Instagram, TikTok, not traditional TV)
Includes <launch_timeline> with pre-launch, launch, and post-launch phases
Strategy emphasizes both tech features and sustainability

inputs.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GreenClean - A new eco-friendly house cleaning service using only non-toxic, plant-based cleaning products. Offers one-time deep cleans and recurring service subscriptions. Service area: Metro City and suburbs.
inputs.TARGET_AUDIENCE: Families with young children and pets, environmentally conscious homeowners aged 30-55, middle to upper-middle income, value convenience and health.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should focus on local marketing tactics, community engagement, and building trust
validation_criteria: Recommends local-focused channels (local SEO, community partnerships, local ads)
Includes timeline suitable for service business
KPIs relevant to service business (bookings, customer acquisition cost, etc.)

inputs.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: TaskFlow Pro - A project management and team collaboration platform designed for remote teams. Features: video integration, automated workflows, time tracking, and advanced reporting. Pricing: $15/user/month with 14-day free trial.
inputs.TARGET_AUDIENCE: Small to medium-sized businesses (10-100 employees), particularly remote-first companies. Decision makers: CTOs, Operations Managers, Team Leads in tech, marketing, and creative industries.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should emphasize B2B channels like LinkedIn, content marketing, webinars, and demo-focused approach
validation_criteria: Recommends B2B-appropriate channels (LinkedIn, content marketing, webinars, not TikTok)
Strategy focuses on lead generation and demo conversions
Budget allocation suitable for B2B SaaS ($80,000 over 6 months)
KPIs include B2B metrics (MQLs, SQLs, demo requests, trial signups)
Timeline accounts for longer B2B sales cycles
